tool_description: Aspose.HTML Cloud is a REST API for manipulating and converting the HTML documents. You can render HTML document into document formats such as PDF and XPS, or into raster image formats such as TIFF, BMP, PNG, and JPEG. You can also select the HTML page markup fragments using the XPath query and extract the images.
name: Aspose.HTML Cloud
title: Aspose.HTML Cloud

api_list.name: PostConvertDocumentInRequestToMarkdown
PostConvertDocumentInRequestToImage
PostImportMarkdownToHtml
PostMergeHtmlTemplate

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description: A data file to populate template. Supported formats: XML, JSON.

api_list.name: PostConvertDocumentInRequestToPdf
PostConvertDocumentInRequestToXps
